title: Charming French Coastal Escape in the Heart of Le Touquet
description: Escape to the picturesque French coast with a stay at the Holiday Inn Resort Le Touquet, an IHG Hotel, perfectly located in the heart of the provincial town. Live like the locals by embracing the easy-going, slow-paced atmosphere as you spend your days feasting on excellent French cuisine, before visiting the trendy nightclubs and stylish casinos. Soak up the sunshine in the verdant gardens or laze by the naturally lit indoor pool.
location_description: Holiday Inn Resort Le Touquet, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Avenue Marechal Foch, Le Touquet, 62520, France
